name: Immunopedia
description:
PKM (Pengabdian Kepada Masyarakat/Community Service) is a Binus Game Development Club (BGDC) work program aimed at producing games with educational themes for people around the world.

Find out more about us on our twitter page! 
https://twitter.com/pkmBGDC 

Please fill in this form so that we can collect data on players who have downloaded our games and their countries of origin.
https://binusgdc.com/pkmbgdc22
